title: Write Google Ads Copy
description: A copywriter needs to create three distinct ad headlines and two descriptions for a new Google Ads campaign.

tasks.description: Review the campaign brief to understand the target audience and unique selling propositions (USPs).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the key messaging points.

tasks.description: Write three headlines, each under the 30-character limit, highlighting different USPs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces three compliant and compelling headlines.

tasks.description: Write two descriptions, each under the 90-character limit, including a call-to-action (CTA).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces two compliant and persuasive descriptions.
